Cofa kuloo nkonzo ukuze ufumane iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo.

IiNkundla Zamabango Amancinci
IiNkundla Zamabango Amancinci zisebenza ngemiba yoluntu apho ibango lingaphantsi kwama-R7000. Zikholo ukwenza ukuba inkqubo yeenkundla ikhawuleze. &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;


iiNkundla Ezijongene Nokulingana
Iinkundla Zokulingana zenzelwe ukujongana nemiba ephantsi komthetho iPromotion of Equality and Prevention of Unfair Discrimination Act 4 ka-2000, mthetho lowo ukwaziwa njenge-Equality Act. &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;


iiNkundla Zasekuhlaleni
uRhulumente uvule iiNkundla Zasekuhlaleni ezintathu eKapa, eMitchell's Plain naseFezeka (eGugulethu/Mannenberg) ngeenjongo zokutshutshisa iintshukumo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezingaxhomisi mehlo kwezi ngingqi. &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;


iiNkundla zooMaspala
Owona msebenzi weeNkundla zooMaspala kukujongana nokukhupha izohlwayo kwiziphoso zemithetho yendlela, kwakunye nokungathotyelwa kwemithetho yoomaspala, efana naleyo:yokahlula-hlula imihlaba kwanelawula izakhiwo, ukungcoliswa kwamanzi, ulawulo lwenkukuma, ukungcoliswa komoya, ukukhanyiswa kweenkantsi, ukuthengisa ngolwazi, iindawo zokupaka izithuthi. &nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;




Umxholo okweli phepha wagqibela ukuhlaziywa nge- 5 uMeyi 2006
